explanation: [0-0] The background is a blue sky and sea. A lady in a red top and colorful leggings is sitting sideways on the sea with her eyes closed. She is holding a pizza box in her left hand and a slice of pizza in her right hand. In the upper left corner, there is a window showing a wooden path outside.

[0-6] First, the lady in red chews and looks ahead, then lowers her head and takes a bite of pizza. She puts the pizza back in the box, closes it, throws the box to the right with both hands, splashing water on the sea. The lady raises her hands, widens her eyes, opens her mouth, looks down to the right, and then turns to look ahead.

[11-15] Finally, the lady in red stretches out her right hand downwards and presses a button on the remote control. The background changes to a purple snow mountain with a pink sky. The purple snow mountain keeps moving to the left. The lady smiles and looks ahead, puts down the remote control with her right hand, then turns sideways and turns her head back. There is a pillow behind her head and she rests her right hand on the pillow.
